House Full At Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan Trailer Launch With Salman, Pooja, Bhumika And Others

 
 
 
 
Updated: April 11, 2023 16:49 IST

Salman Khan and team Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan lit up the film's trailer launch event in Mumbai like this.

Salman Khan made a striking appearance at the event. (Image courtesy: Varinder Chawla)
Salman Khan and Pooja Hegde happily posed together. (Image courtesy: Varinder Chawla)
Pooja Hegde was a ray of sunshine. (Image courtesy: Varinder Chawla)
A Tere Naam reunion of sorts for Salman Khan and Bhumika Chawla. (Image courtesy: Varinder Chawla)
Shehnaaz Gill made a stylish appearance at the event. (Image courtesy: Varinder Chawla)
Palak Tiwari, who makes her debut with the film, was also pictured at the event. (Image courtesy: Varinder Chawla)
Boxer Vijender Singh, who also stars in the film, pictured at the event. (Image courtesy: Varinder Chawla)
Hello there, Raghav Juyal. (Image courtesy: Varinder Chawla)
The one with the entire cast of Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan, minus Venkatesh. (Image courtesy: Varinder Chawla)
